body: meh..Cover page is a bit too plain. Art style is unique tho ngl[8/10]. Dialogues is kind lacking[5/10]. Story is trash tbh, nothing makes sense[1/10]. Colors are a bit too light it hurts my eyes[2/10]. overall i'll give it a 5/10, +1 if translated.

Masterpiece
Better plot than 99% of ntr

This is truly a modern masterpiece, I have never seen such doujin with such well thought out plot, such complex characters and such perfectly captured depth of human emotions, even the subtle emotions was so well reflected with merely a pen and unprecedented skill. This story also tackles on the question on what defines our moral, it shows and put heavy emphasis on the blurred line between what we say is the so called good and evil. It makes us all reflect upon our life, we should ask ourselves, what is evil? And what is good? When we do something, can we really just classify yourself without thinking? It also shows both how beautiful and ugly can the human soul be, it shows in this beautiful yet cruel world how one can be driven into the depth of darkness and insanity by the unfair and cruel circumstances that we could never wish to fix, but it also shows that how beautiful can humans be to go through the end of this world to help others they truly care about. 11/10 story

This is some Christopher Nolan type deep shit.
